commandText:
SELECT `s`.`Id`, `s`.`Age`, `s`.`Class`, `s`.`Country`, `s`.`Firstname`, `s`.`Lastname`, `s`.`Sex`, `s`.`StudentNo`
FROM `Students` AS `s`
WHERE (`s`.`Id` = @__id_0) AND (`s`.`Lastname` = @__lastname_1)
LIMIT 1
